typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		device_id as string,
		customer_id as string,
		store_id as string,
		timestamp as long,
		stay_time as integer,
		age as integer,
		gender as string,
		mask as string,
		watch_time as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer') ~> source1
source1 derive(generation = case(age < 10 && age >= 0, 0,
case(age < 20 && age >= 10, 10,
case(age < 30 && age >= 20, 20,
case(age < 40 && age >= 30, 30,
case(age < 50 && age >= 40, 40,
case(age < 60 && age >= 50, 50,
case(age < 70 && age >= 60, 60,
case(age < 80 && age >= 70, 70,
case(age < 90 && age >= 80, 80,
case(age < 100 && age >= 90, 90, -1)))))))))),
		gender = case(gender == 'male', 1,
case(gender == 'female', 2, 0)),
		watch_time_count = iif(watch_time > 0, 1, 0),
		target_hour = toString(toTimestamp('1970-01-01 00:00:00') + seconds(toInteger(timestamp/1000)), 'yyyy-MM-dd-HH'),
		mask = case(mask == 'good', 1,
case(mask == 'bad', 2,
case(mask == 'none', 0, -1)))) ~> Convert
WatchtimeTableAggregation select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WatchtimeTableSelect
Convert aggregate(groupBy(customer_id,
		store_id,
		target_hour,
		generation,
		gender),
	stay_time_sum = sum(stay_time),
		watch_time_sum = sum(watch_time),
		watch_count = sum(watch_time_count),
		count = count(customer_id)) ~> WatchtimeTableAggregation
Convert aggregate(groupBy(customer_id,
		target_hour,
		mask,
		store_id),
	mask_count = count(mask)) ~> MaskTableAggregation
MaskTableAggregation select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MaskTableSelect
WatchtimeTableSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WatchtimeTableSink
MaskTableSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> MaskTableSink
